name: PlayEnglish
summary: If you have always been your most and your less with the language of Shakespeare but you still do not dominate it, maybe playing your problems are solved. Yes, you read right, no need to go to school or you hear ‘cassettes’ (or ‘deuvedeses’!) Compulsively.
